snippet: As American and Chinese officials convene talks, Treasury officials are vowing to press China to make its currency and financial systems more responsive to market forces.
abstract: American and Chinese officials prepare to convene talks, and Treasury officials are vowing to press China to make its currency and financial systems more responsive to market forces; pace of appreciation of the renminbi against the dollar has slowed in the last year, ensuring that China's manipulation of its exchange rate remains a central topic.
lead_paragraph: As American and Chinese officials convene talks, Treasury officials are vowing to press China to make its currency and financial systems more responsive to market forces.

headline.seo: As Appreciation of China Currency Slows, Manipulation Remains an Issue
headline.main: China Curbs on Currency Still an Issue
headline.print_headline: China Curbs On Currency Still an Issue
